I am looking for a coverage tool that works with JUnit. If you know some,
pls let me know. Few days ago, 
while surfing the Internet, I did come across to a coverage tool, Quilt
which works with JUnit. But now when I 
am tryiing to find it I am unsucessful. May be no tool by this name exist.
If you have any information about this tool or
any other tool (coverage) that goes with JUnit, 
regards,
Tariq
subject: Re: Coverage tool that works with JUnit
